page.title: 13CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Here are some games I like to play in the playground.Electric chairs,tig,chocolate,leap-frog and stuck-in-the-mud.Leap-frog is a game where some people bend down so that they hold onto their knees or ankles and wother person runs up to them,places their hands on the other persons back and jumps over him.They carry on taking it in turns. Electric chairs is a game where one person lies on the ground with their legs bent in the air. nother person sits on the first persons feet who pushes their legs upwards.The person sat on the feet flies up into the air and either lands on their feet or their bottom. Tig is a game where someone is on it.Everyone runs away and that person tries to touch or "tig" them.
